alert.note: Alert for Bering Strait Coast; Shishmaref; St Lawrence Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 15 at 8:55AM AKST until January 16 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow with blizzard conditions and brief freezing rain possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph. Visibility one quarter mile or less at times. * WHERE...Shishmaref and Diomede. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow will cause whiteout conditions. Gusty winds could cause power outages. The strongest winds are expected at Diomede this afternoon.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means significant amounts of snow, sleet and ice are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: Bering Strait Coast; Shishmaref; St Lawrence Island
